There were far too many hands on the steering wheel, which, in my view, was a formula for running the truck into a ditch, Donald Rumsfeld writes in the book. Providing pointed critiques of other former colleagues, Donald Rumsfeld portrays Colin Powell as reigning over a State Department reluctant to accept President Bush 's political direction and intent on taking anonymous swipes at the

More than anything else I have failed to do," he writes, and even amid my pride in the many important things that we did accomplish, I regret that I did not leave at that point. Fans of Washington insider politics, meanwhile, will find plenty to chew over. Donald Rumsfeld does not hesitate to dish on the personal squabbles that plagued the President Bush administration. all the associated costs are deducted. However Simon Cowell has insisted that all the cash will go directly to the winner and not to label staff. During a conference call with reporters he said: I'm nervous but I'm also confident that it was the right thing to do. I think it should be a life-changing prize and just to be clear, this isn't a dressed-up$ 5 million. This is a guaranteed$ 5 million payable to the winner. The recording, marketing and video costs are completely separate to that. It will be paid over five years at$ 1 million a year.
